post.body: Cool... I will.
had mentioned $FSLR becoming a bank.For me that would be False Savings & Loan Repository (that is a safe buried in the yard).
I am over 50 and I act like I'm 12. I can type and occasionally spell properly though.
You might call that the @cybersanta IRON100 bailout plan. @cybersanta would have to be the Treasury or Warren Buffett though.
I signed up for @cybersanta and kept making small requests, got nothing. I decided to go big and see what happened lol.
Does Ozzie's cellphone end up smashed against the wall and then stomped?
Learning how to post images and sort through the HTML layers to post them properly. I have a lot to learn.
No, RSS (in fact the whole site) is up, but I am playing mad scientist with it experimenting with widgets (it has one now)
A little more history http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Falco_(musician) He indeed did write it but somehow lost the rights to it.
If I am not mistaken, Falco actually wrote the song (but there was controversy about some aspect of that).
This is virtually the only version I ever heard in NOLA http://tinyurl.com/5675wo
Cerberus should find a way to bail itself out. Indeed, bad investments (as all investments) require a private exit strategy.
goodnight
Prince is (though controversial) a great artist. Original through and though, love him.
I watched R&B when James Brown was on ETV every morning (true story), that is how most people in the South watched soul/R&B
I am on the James Brown side of rap (the R &B side). Q TIP just doesn't get it for me..but I never stop others from their choice.
Let us just agree to disagree..I loved and still do @MCHammer, but this stuff today is incredibly degrading(but that is my opin).
I will get past it when the majority of high school students can read at a 6th grade level. Minstrel shows were banned in the 50s
Its not the beat I dislike, its the hacks ruining classic songs who barely have the IQ to write that slays me (I hate hiphop).
#music @jodyg
I almost tried my small hand in it and saw the near term writing on the wall. Unless your cap rate is huge & rents steady avoid.
I only know real estate from my own experience, but there seem to be very few who do comm. real estate well in tough times.
And don't force me to sing that version. I think it was so high pitched that recording it must have killed her (Just kidding).
Closest movie I can think of that is close to that one in terms of futility is"The Happening".That one is totally pointless.
I try only to go to movies that are worth the trip to pay 7 bucks otherwise it is Netflix. Few movies meet that standard today.
Yes, it is horrible. I would just wait and rent it. Word of mouth will likely kill the film off after the first week.
Not too bad a price...wood deck would be a maintenance hassle though, but not bad.
I eventually may blog list of books 4 people who want to study basic stuff.Lot of good books I have are out of print/hard 2 find.
I am going to do some of that locally. Later today I will rant about something as important...filling the food banks.
I got tired of corporate America because I tended to express myself openly. Some folks hold grudges.Politics are weird to me.
If it gets personal, business managers on both sides can take it off line and work it out.We had some situations like that.
and I feel the same way, but corporate cultures vary. Sometimes you have to suck it up. Next msg.coming..
I love banter too. Makes me think. Gets me involved in process of idea generation.
But because we could deliver product at costs 30% below the nearest competitor, we adjusted, got HUGE orders.Worth the abuse.
IBM used to be one of our biggest clients.They spent hours browbeating us over tinyt hings.We sat silently took notes.
In Base 2, 1 + 1 = 10 lol...maybe that's just a baker's Ten lol.
I hope you are listening to Gov. Sanford, seemingly the last voice of reason in the long lost Republican Party.
There are so many things I could say but most people would disconnect from me if I said 'em.All those meat and beef references..
For $AAPL, what manner of succession does the company have for Steve Jobs? Seems $AAPL is kind of a techie cult of personality.
I don't have my camera set up. Once I do I will. Its amazing what you can buy at stores now. They're desperate to unload stuff.
If you can find a decent spread and a good premium, then you have the ability to protect it, but it is hard to do, takes research.
And that is the key issue with options, trying to find those key times when premiums contract in your favor as expir. draws near.
Its really hard to hold the ultrashorts overnight because hedgers and funds use them to slide by margin rules. I'd trade intraday.
Exploring ways of using options intraday to exploit those moves, not exactly sure how to do that, but I know it can be done.
The completion pattern on $SRS at 63.26 was a natural short at last back to that support near 61.24. This time it went past.
Wish I could have fortune8, but I trade stocks in my IRA. Only longs and untrashort ETFs. I can trade forex and index futures tho.
I may actually begin to trade those breakout swings more often intraday. Long multiday swings are really tough to manage now.
U da man. I was expecting 63.26 (which it did do, and then a dive bomb back to 61.24.it did that too amazingly after slopping)
FEMA = Failed Emergency Mania Alternative, SEC = soullessly existential and comatose lol.
were you long or short $SRS?
The channel at that time was between the previous low 61.81 and the previous high 62.76.
Gotta switch over the digital firehose for tomorrows trades. Good night all. Have fun.
John Daly should remain under house arrest at Hooters: http://tinyurl.com/5blh2n
Oh, well, @cybersanta has broken my heart once again lol
I still want my 100 million dollars in small unmarked bills.
Blog link disabled until I can repair the blog and add the goodies I want. More later.
Falco's new hit lyrics..."Don't come around uhoh..."Der Car-Czars back in town uhoh" lol
FSLR as a bank : False Savings and Loan Repository lol
Gutter cleaning Round 2 (the FINAL round) is completed. Not again until November 2009!
That stuff was fresh and the artists (like Wilson Pickett, Aretha Franklin, James Brown) took real chances to be heard.
Gotta remember to save my rants for the blogs...sorry folks :).
Way too busy for my own good this weekend. I guess I will get to chill out after Christmas.
There is a scene that will excite many Dallas Cowboys fans in The Day The Earth Stood Still...but I would still just RENTit lol.
Time for a fun check. Is anyone having fun yet?
$$ After that correction, the earnings outlook window my clear for steel products companies, and opportunities to buy may appear.More later.
$$ This is general comment. I think most steel products cos. like $STLD may rally but then correct in early 2009.
$$ If I get a chance this weekend I will try to explain why I do not think its a btm but thats not stopping instit. from building positions.
$$ $JCG is another clothing retailer seemingly poised for rally as is $JCP. I still believe institutions are cherry picking sectors. Bottom?
$$ No stats just yet, but clothing retailers like $GES $AEO are trying to put in some kind of end of year rally.
And I thought fast food was bad..No, Burger King...NO! http://www.firemeetsdesire.com/
$$ I get busy during the day (and wi/year end tax crap even busier lol)but I will try to post charts where I can in blog on things like $GME
$GME I think volume may dry up pre-holiday, but one piece of the Fib model still sees a target of $28 in the next week or so. Have to watch.
I must now shift gears into other business stuff. More later :)
$GS Goldman daily chart looks like an ascending wedge pattern in trouble lol. Will have to watch. Momentum though if closes near here, is +.
$ATW set the rest to breakeven if you keep some.
$ATW those of you long around 13.79 should best cover what you have now.That trade could still work longer take partial profits at least.
$SRS ultimate low target in this swing is around 56.60 now (what a round trip that was).
$$ Methinks the unwind trades in these ultrashorts will be good for the balance of the year :)
$SRS Depending on the shorting interest in it 58.46 is also not out of the realm of possibility.
$SRS Could easily take out 59.41 now.
